Why... I don't think I remember...
Oh...well that's alright. Do you need help?
I think... i'm supposed to help you.
He rustles in his pockets, before producing a crumpled
scrap of paper and handing it to you.
It's a verse of some sort. It says:
"To unlock the gate beyond, awaken the harmony
of the elements. Begin with the force that
quenches, then stir the breath, awaken the
foundation, and finally unleash the flame."
My lab, take whatever you need.

Looks like alchemy textbooks - Tali, anything
